Faculty of Technology and Science

Are you ready
for an these Major

The term "Faculty of Technology and Science" typically refers to an academic division within an educational institution that focuses on disciplines related to technology, engineering, and scientific fields. It is commonly found in universities, colleges, and technical institutes.
The Faculty of Technology and Science offers undergraduate and postgraduate degree programs, as well as research opportunities in these disciplines. It plays a vital role in advancing scientific knowledge, technological innovation, and preparing students for careers in technology, engineering, research, and related industries.
